alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Lee; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chickasaw, southeastern Pontotoc and southwestern Lee Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Troy, or near Pontotoc, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Verona, Okolona, Shannon, Troy, Furrs, Algoma, Chiwapa, Palmetto, Leotis, Rough Edge, Old Union, Wallfield and George P Cossar State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
